body: date: date
title: title
author: ${1:AlbertoVf}
tags: []
resume: ${2:descripcion}
footer: \${title} - [\${pageNo}]
marp: true
size: 16:9
paginate: true
theme: uncover
transition: fade-out
math: mathjax
<style>
h1 +h2{ font-style: italic; font-size: 95%; }
p{ text-align:justify; letter-spacing: 0.4px; font-size: 70%; }
blockquote{ font-style: italic; font-size:100%; }
</style>
